ai-patthana7.4:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.4:3.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on the teaching, and on not grasping. Consciousness arises dependent on the Teachings.
ai-patthana7.4:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana7.4:4.1_0: less than twenty-four grounds for a single object ...
